dict.acceptation: 明辨道理地；合理地；有理性地；相当地；

sent.orig: Therefore, development prospect of conventional fire-retardant fibers, fire retardant and fire proofing methods are forecasted reasonably.
sent.trans: 并合理预测了常规阻燃纤维、阻燃剂和织物阻燃整理方法的发展趋势。

sent.orig: The basic idea of oil deposit management is reasonably.
sent.trans: 油藏治理的基本概念是合理地。

sent.orig: Although automatic text translators are now reasonably effective, voice recognition has proved more challenging.
sent.trans: 尽管自动文本语言翻译目前相当有效，语音识别还是十分具有挑战性的。

sent.orig: An agreement can be reached in a reasonably short time frame.
sent.trans: 协议可以在合理的较短时间内达成。

sent.orig: Competitor price reasonably presume us 185 or under.
sent.trans: 估计同行的价格可能是185美元或更低。
